title: Rapunzel
brief_description: Olivia Newton-John and friends present this timeless classic. Locked in a tower by the evil witch Scarlotta, Rapunzel’s glorious long hair provides the only bridge between Rapunzel and her handsome Prince. The two lovers are discovered by Scarlotta who punishes the Prince by turning him into a bird and banishes Rapunzel to the forest. Please note, there is a TCR counter in the top left hand corner throughout the transmission.
